oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Unidentified man seated on a bluff of Lookout Mountain with a house on top, the Tennessee River visible in the middle background
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A black-and-white photograph of a large rock projecting from the face of Lookout Mountain, with a small wooden frame house located on its top surface.

Based on the photographs in our collection, being photographed while hanging over a prominent area rock face was a fashionable endeavor for young Tennessean men in the late nineteenth and early twentieth centuries.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cliffs -- Tennessee; Mountains; Rivers; Houses
Photographs; Cliffs; Mountains; Daredevils
